title: Agent Builder
subtitle: Multi-agent demos with architect planning, dataset toggles, and streaming chains.
narrative: Each card seeds a realistic workflow. Run the architect to auto-generate specialist roles, review the suggested datasets, upload your own context, and stream the chain result inside the browser.

defaults.architectPrompt: Respond ONLY with JSON shaped as {"plan":[...],"inputs":[...]}. "plan": 2-5 agents, each with {"agentName","systemInstruction","initialTask"}. At least one validator. "inputs": up to 3 sample datasets with {"title","type","sample"}. Types: text,csv,json. Keep samples short (<=120 words).
defaults.agentStyle: You are a focused specialist. Answer in <=50 words using crisp markdown bullets.

demos.title: Regulatory Compliance
demos.body: Audit 10-K style filings against SEC + Basel guidance.
demos.problem: Build a regulatory compliance analyzer that ingests filings (10-K, 10-Q, prospectuses), extracts key sections, checks SEC/Basel/MiFID rules, runs gap + risk scoring loops, and outputs an audit-ready report.
